comments.body: Probably you need to update _config.yaml before you can view the docs, I can be wrong.
Probably you need to add an entry here: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/gh-pages/_config.yml#L87

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +72,76 @@* [Pull docs from release branch](#updating-docs-in-gh-pages-branch) in `_vX.Y`
  folder.

Once these changes have been submitted, you should be able to reach the docs at
`http://kubernetes.io/vX.Y/docs/` where you can test them.

comments.body:
Include the following instruction: Run the [online tool](https://www.xml-sitemaps.com/index.php?errmsg=wr&initurl=%2F) by specifying the http://kubernetes.io/ URL. Then put the new sitemap.xml file in the gh-pages branch by replacing this existing sitemap.xml file.

We also need to run "resubmit sitemap" in [search console](https://www.google.com/webmasters/tools/sitemap-list?hl=en&siteUrl=http://kubernetes.io/#MAIN_TAB=0&CARD_TAB=-1) after generating sitemaps.xml.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +86,90 @@  file to hide old content from web crawlers and focus SEO on new docs. Example PR:
  [#16388](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/16388).
* Regenerate [sitemaps.xml](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/gh-pages/sitemap.xml)
  so that it now contains `vX.Y` links. Sitemap can be regenerated using
  https://www.xml-sitemaps.com. Example PR: [#17126](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/17126).

@@ -1,1 +79,83 @@
* Update [_config.yml](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/gh-pages/_config.yml)
  and [/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/gh-pages/_docs/index.md](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/gh-pages/_docs/index.md)
  to point to the new version. Example PR: [#16416](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/16416).
* Update [_includes/docversionselector.html](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/gh-pages/_includes/docversionselector.html)
